categoryDescription: All of our dishes are made with specially picked fresh products. With them, our collaborators are able to assemble incredible evegan meals, full of flavor
imageDescription: a salad plate with tomato, lettuce, avocado, yellow pepper, carrots, and sause.

dishes.name: Lentil Bolognese
dishes.dishDescription: Rich and robust, this plant-based Lentil Bolognese is hearty, “meaty” and full of depth of flavor.

dishes.name: Vegetable Biryani
dishes.dishDescription: An aromatic Indian rice dish with vegetables and chickpeas - infused with Indian spices.

dishes.name: Whole Roasted Cauliflower
dishes.dishDescription: A whole cauliflower roasted in the oven until golden and tender.

dishes.name: Frankies (Bombay Burritos)
dishes.dishDescription: India's flavorful street food -also called a Bombay Burrito, made healthy!

dishes.name: Vegan Shepherds Pie
dishes.dishDescription: A cozy fall recipe for  Vegan Shepherds Pie with mushrooms and root vegetables

categoryDescription: Our delicious desserts are prepared taking into consideration  the moistness and fat that traditional dairy ingredients offer. An the best part - we only use vegan-friendly ingredients.
imageDescription: five glasses containing redberry drinks, with a red flower in the back

dishes.name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookie Bar
dishes.dishDescription: A fudgy cacao topping covers a decadent peanut butter chocolate chip layer.

dishes.name: Vegan Ice Cream
dishes.dishDescription: Say hello to the BEST vegan ice cream, super creamy, smooth, rich, delicious!

dishes.name: Chocolate Pudding Pops
dishes.dishDescription: Creamy from avocado & almond butter, these healthy treats are perfect on hot summer days.

dishes.name: Raspberry Vegan Cheesecake
dishes.dishDescription: A tart raspberry layer, a creamy 'cheesecake' layer, and a gluten-free walnut crust make this easy vegan cheesecake recipe tangy, rich & delicious.

dishes.name: Pumpkin Pudding
dishes.dishDescription: It's super rich and creamy, and maple, vanilla, and cinnamon fill it with warm autumn flavor.

categoryDescription: Our cocktails use fun, natural ingredients to add color and flavor to your day.
imageDescription: pancakes with syrip and blueberries on top

dishes.name: Strawberry Lemonade
dishes.dishDescription: In the scorching Summer heat, these refreshing and fruity lemonades will feel like taking a dip in the cool ocean.

dishes.name: Ginger Beer Mojito
dishes.dishDescription: Adding ginger beer to cocktails it is seriously the best mixer!

dishes.name: Frozen Blackberry Coolers
dishes.dishDescription: They're sweet but have a little touch of tart too!

dishes.name: Cucumber Vodka Soda
dishes.dishDescription: It is so super refreshing on a hot summer day because it is light and cold!

dishes.name: Galaxi Mocktail
dishes.dishDescription: It's a refreshing slushie drink that tastes as good as it looks!
